title: And God Created Vampires
description: Mary Hoffman, aka Erica, the Dancing Valkyrie, the vampire who owns a gentleman's club in Schenectady, NY, continues her growth and experience as a vampire.In this third book in the series, she confronts mistakes made as she tries to untangle herself from those mistakes and extricate herself from being under surveillance by both the FBI and CIA.Who and how many will she need to kill to live freely as a vampire created by God?
author: Peter Klein
